All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.hadoop.mapred.InputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,Population>, org.apache.hadoop.mapred.JobConfigurable
public class Individuals
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapred.FileInputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,Population>
implements org.apache.hadoop.mapred.JobConfigurable

This class extends FileInputFormat which is a base class for file-based . it override the isSplitable(FileSystem, Path)} method to ensure input-files are not split-up and are processed as a whole by Mappers. Text is the input file to be processed Population is the candidates of solution to evolve
